title: 'Fashionable but uncomfy'
body: The dark stripped grindle style looks great from a distance at first, but the sweater itself isnt that comfortable to wear.. itchy around the neck as well. It is VERY warm however, so it would be great for winters or when travelling to colder areas/countries. Not sure if it's worth the price though.

title: 'Warm Comfortable'
body: It's XXL, but it's body fit, sticks to the shape of the body, it is stretchable, it is warm over a simple cotton shirt in 5¬∞c cold. Haven't washed yet. Don't know if it will loose color, or will it have the bur in the long run, but it doesn't cause rashes/skin irritation while direct contact with skin.
